phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Shinji, just concentrate on walking right now.
What is going on with the Eva's defense system?
There is a crack on the front of the brain case!
The armor will not last much longer!
The control nerves are breaking off!
We are not getting any readings on the pilot!
It is the same as it was fifteen years ago.
A disaster comes as it will, without warning.
On the positive side, our previous investments will not go to waste.
You cannot be sure about that yet.
If it does not pay off, it is a waste all the same.
Now that the Angels have become common knowledge,
we have to manipulate the information to avoid trouble.
NERV must take care of these matters quickly.
It is already been taken care of.
You may rest assure of that.
In regards to the declaration of the state of emergency,
Public scenario B-22, as we thought.
So, we are hushing up the truth again?
No, there is no threat of contamination from the center of the explosion.
But at least our Public Relation people are thrilled.
No, there is no threat of contamination from the center of the explosion.
But at least our Public Relation people are thrilled.
The only Angel samples collected were adhered to the Eva.
Now that they have finally got something to do.
The only Angel samples collected were adhered to the Eva.
We are being pretty casual about it.
The only Angel samples collected were adhered to the Eva.
We are being pretty casual about it.
Correct, as in the model simulation, approximately 99.9 of it evaporated.
I think we are all scared to death.
Correct, as in the model simulation, approximately 99.9 of it evaporated.
Correct, as in the model simulation, approximately 99.9 of it evaporated.
is not there a better way to utilize NERV and Eva?
We are referring to the repair costs for Unit 01,
which when added to the costs for Unit 00,
are enough to bankrupt an entire country.
We also understand that you gave that particular toy to your son, did not you?
How much more will be wasted by you and your family?
And that is not your only responsibility.
that should be your top priority.
Yes, in these desperate circumstances that project is our only hope.
In any case, the Angel is no excuse for delaying that project's schedule.
However, we will consider adjusting the budget.
Now, the rest of this meeting concerns only us.
Your presence here was appreciated, Mr. Ikari.
Ikari, you do understand there can be no turning back, do not you?
Air conditioning has just got to be mankind's greatest treasure.
It is the triumph of science over nature.
His memory is a bit muddled, however.
You do not think it could be brain damage?
The doctor said that there was nothing to worry about.
I suppose he did have a pretty hectic day.
His cranial nerves must have taken a lot of strain.
Do not you mean his heart?
If Eva and this city both operate at their full potential,
maybe we can make it through this.
Are you going to defeat the Angels?
You are always such an optimist.
Sometimes you need a little wishful thinking just to keep on living.
Your attitude makes me feel a little more at ease.
Dr. Ugai of Internal Department One, Dr. Ugai,
Dr. Ugai of Internal Department One, Dr. Ugai,
please call Dr. Azuma of the First Surgical Department immediately.
The medical conference on the B Experiment will be held as scheduled.
All supervisors please proceed to conference room two.
They do not want to live together?
I think that living apart is natural for Ikari and his son.
His room will be in the Sixth Block, just beyond this one.
Being alone is okay with me.
So, I said, I will take care of Shinji.
So, I said, I will take care of Shinji.
I have already got permission from the brass.
Hey, it is not like I am going to put the moves on him.
How could you even think of such a thing?
She just cannot take a joke.
Well, we will have to have a party tonight, right?
A welcoming party for my new roommate, of course!
A welcoming party for my new roommate, of course!
So, you are going to move after all?
I would never have dreamt that this city would become a battlefield.
My husband's saying that our kid and I should move, at the very least.
This city may be a fortress, but that is no guarantee of safety.
Just remembering it gives me the chills.
I hope you do not mind if we make a little stop on the way.
This city is a fortress, designed to protect against the Angels.
And it is the city that you saved.
Your things should have already been delivered, Shinji.
I just moved into this apartment too.
Shinji, this is your home now.
As you can see, the place is a little bit messy.
Could you put the food in the fridge?
What kind of a life does she lead?
What is in the other fridge?
Life just does not get any better than this!
Do not you want to eat?
It is good, even if it is all instant.
I am sorry, I am just not used to it.
No, that is not what I... well...
Having two for dinner instead of eating alone!
Here we go for the next one.
That was a pretty fair way of splitting our daily chores, right?
This is your home now, so make yourself comfortable,
This is your home now, so make yourself comfortable,
and take advantage of everything here, except me.
It is getting on my nerves.
It is getting on my nerves.
You are a boy, are not you?
Okay, that is just the way you are.
Well, why do not you go take a bath and scrub away those bad memories.
Bathing cleanses both the mind and soul.
He is one of those new warm water penguins.
Why do not you cover that up?
I guess I am not being as nice as I ought to.
Of course, he is probably already made up his mind about me.
She is not a bad person.
Bathing cleanses both the mind and soul.
But bad memories always seem to find me when I am in the bath.
You did see her at the hospital this afternoon, did not you?
She will be ready to work again in twenty days.
By then, we will be ready to re-activate Unit 00 from cryo-stasis.
It is so hard on these poor children.
There is no one else who can pilot the Evas.
As long as they survive, that is what I will have them do.
With no regard to what they may want?
Yeah, after all the horrible stuff he went through,
I doubt that he will pilot it again.
Maintaining him is part of your job, Misato.
I do not know how to deal with him.
It was your idea to take him in, you know.
I was just thinking of Shinji as a tool.
I am as shameless as Ritsuko.
So, why cannot I be happy about it?
In this whole city, there is no place that is familiar.
The brain case has been damaged!
We are having problems maintaining activation!
It is not accepting the signal!
We have got to stop this.
Rescuing the pilot is our first priority!
It is completely out of control!
It looks like we have won.
As long as the Angel has that AT field up...
He cannot get near the Angel!
The left arm has been regenerated!
The left arm has been regenerated!
Unit 01's expanding an AT field of its own!
It is neutralizing the phase space!
No, not neutralizing, it is eroding it!
It went through that AT field so easily.
Preserving the pilot's life is our first priority.
I forgot to tell you something.
You did a very good thing today.
You should be proud of yourself.
Shinji starts a new life with the training of Eva, school, and a roommate.
Next time: A Phone That Never Rings.
And of course, I will give you good service!
